description.value:
Contains Glowstick, Power Cell, 1 Day of Rations, Emergency Vox, 30 mins of Air + Mask, Anti-Radiation Tablets, and Hull Sealent Spray.

Requirements

Glowstick lasts 1d5 hours, power cell powers glowstick/vox for 1d5 hours, or 5 laspistol shots, Vox may have distress signal.

Effect: Common

Notes: 300 T
